message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is a limited-time offer, so don't hesitate to accept it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the discount, but I'm really hoping to get the product for closer to $90.  Let me know what you think.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle? I'll offer the product for $92.50. It's still a discount, but closer to what you're looking for.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to get the product for $91.  This is my final offer, let me know if you're willing to take it.
Considering your last offer, I believe we can reach an agreement. I'll propose the product for $91.50. It's slightly above your offer, but still a good deal. Let me know what you think.
